bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lian mei chuang 煉眉瘡 , tempered eyebrows sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry tu si zi 菟絲子 quoting Shan ju si yao 山居四要 3: 小兒眉練瘡 , “eyebrows of children tempered with sores”, writes 眉煉癬瘡 , “ Tempered eyebrows with xuan -illness sores”. The phrasing 小兒眉練瘡 is an erroneous version of the older term 小兒眉煉 , tempered eyebrows of children, discussed in the Ru men shi qin 儒門事親 5 for the first time.
